item.title: Katie add a quote by Amy Hempel
item.description: "I exaggerated even before I began to exaggerate, because it's true â€” nothing is ever quite as bad as it could be." -- Amy Hempel

item.title: Katie add a quote by Amy Hempel
item.description: " I think of the chimp, the one with the talking hands. In the course of the experiment, that chimp had a baby. Imagine how her trainers must have thrilled when the mother, without prompting, began to sign her newborn. Baby, drink milk. Baby, play ball. And when the baby died, the mother stood over the body, her wrinkled hands moving with animal grace, forming again and again the words: Baby, come hug, Baby come hug, fluent now in the language of grief." -- Amy Hempel

item.title: Katie add a quote by Nikki Sixx
item.description: "There is something about spending Christmas alone, naked, sitting by the Christmas tree gripping a shotgun, that lets you know your life is spinning dangerously outta control." -- Nikki Sixx

item.title: Katie add a quote by Marilynne Robinson
item.description: "Every single one of us is a little civilization built on the ruins of any number of preceding civilizations, but with our own variant notions of what is beautiful and what is acceptable - which, I haste to add, we generally do not satisfy and by which we struggle to live." -- Marilynne Robinson
